Description: NO BROKER FEE! NO LEAD PAINT! This charming SINGLE FAMILY HOME in 02125 has been modernized over the last couple years and offers everything you could ask for! There are shiny hardwood floors throughout except in the fully tiled bathroom and kitchen! There is a brand new counter top and hood vent over the stove. All of the windows and wiring have been replaced and the entire home is freshly painted! There is a garage, patio and deck that offer everything you need with a short commute to local universities, hospitals and everything else that Boston has to offer.
